item.title: Express Middleware: A Dummy Overview
item.description: Specific aspects of Web Development elude me even after getting my Associate’s in Web Development. Specifically moreover, a lot of the back-end terminology, tools, and concepts. Middleware started off as something which eluded me, but hopefully, I can clarify it and put it in a way that my brain understood it. Middleware Express provides some key points I want to highlight in this condensed lesson provided by expressjs.com. Middleware can:
